metrics module

Author: Alpha Team Group Project Date: March 2023 Purpose: Compute the metrics for the NetworkX graphs

metrics.clean_df(df)[source]
Function:

Clean the dataframe by rounding the values to 6 decimals and shortening the strings to 12 characters

Parameters:

df (pd.DataFrame) – Pandas dataframe to clean

Returns:

Pandas dataframe cleaned

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

metrics.export_to_csv(df, filename)[source]
Function:

Export the dataframe to a csv file

Parameters:

  • df – Pandas dataframe

  • filename – Filename

Returns:

1 if the file is exported

metrics.get_metrics(networkGraphs, method, clean=True, directed=False, multi=False)[source]
Function:

Get the metrics for the given graph

Method:

  • ‘kcore’

  • ‘degree’

  • ‘triangles’

  • ‘pagerank’

  • ‘betweenness_centrality’

  • ‘closeness_centrality’

  • ‘eigenvector_centrality’

  • ‘load_centrality’

  • ‘degree_centrality’

Parameters:

  • networkGraphs (NetworkGraphs) – Network graphs

  • method (str) – Method to compute the metrics

  • clean (bool) – Clean result DataFrame after computing the metrics

  • directed (bool) – Compute the metrics for the directed graph

  • multi (bool) – Compute the metrics for the multi graph

Returns:

Pandas dataframe with the metrics and values

Return type:

pd.DataFrame
